short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChandlerAi, your affordable personal AI assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📍Meet ChandlerAi (https://chandler.bet), your all-in-one AI assistant to make every second productive and creative.

🤖 Core features include:
✅ Chat with the most advanced AI models, including GPT-4, Claude3 Opus, Gemini, Llama3, GPT-3.5, etc.
✔️ Learn new languages through conversation and grammar corrections.
✔️ Assist in coding by generating code snippets and explaining.
✔️ Write stories, poems, and generating ideas.
✔️ Translate or compose detailed reports for any purpose.

✅ AI-Powered search
✔️ Search real-time and accurate information.
✔️ Aggregate information from diverse sources with ease.
✔️ Do research and analyze effortlessly with the all-in-one assistant.

✅ PPT creation
✔️ Transform your ideas to slides in seconds.
✔️ Generate precise and insightful content.
✔️ Edit PPTs through seamless human-machine interactions.

✅ Read files or URLs. 
✔️ Read Files: Upload a file, such as a PDF, Word, Excel, etc., and discuss its content for enhanced comprehension.
✔️ Read Image: Upload an image and explore it through questions answered by AI.
✔️ Webpage Summary: Receive concise summaries without having to read full webpages.
✔️ YouTube Summary: Obtain detailed summaries without watching entire videos.

✅ Image generation
✔️ Generate images based on your input instructions.
✔️ Refine images in different styles. 
✔️ Create avatars referring to an attached image. 
✔️ Design Logos. 

✅ Video generation
✔️ Generate videos based on your text descriptions.
✔️ Convert images into animated sequences.
✔️ Create short promotional videos or advertisements.

💻 Support platforms: 
🌐 At mychandler.bet, MacOS, Windows, and Chrome Webstore. 

❓Frequently Asked Questions:
➡️ Does ChandlerAi offer a free trial before purchase?
- Yes. For each month, we offer 
* 40 queries for advanced models, including GPT-4, Claude3, etc.
* Unlimited queries for base models, including GPT-3.5, Llama3 70B, etc.

➡️ Why is ChandlerAi called your affordable AI assistant?
- The membership prices for ChandlerAi are significantly lower compared to other AI subscription plans, such as ChatGPT, Claude3, etc. ChandlerAi offers three membership tiers:
* The first tier costs only $3.99 per month for 600 advanced queries.
* The second tier costs $7.99 per month for 2000 advanced queries.
* The third tier costs $24.79 per month for unlimited usage.

➡️ ChatGPT is prohibited in my country. Can ChandlerAi still work here?
- Yes, our extension works globally without limitations.

➡️ Is it necessary to have a OpenAI account to use this extension?
- No, using this extension does not require a ChatGPT account.

📫 Contact Us:
Got questions or suggestions? Feel free to contact us at 📧 contact@chandler.bet
